qaConstraints.arlRule:
self.out_Bugs
->select(bug | bug.affectsItems
  ->exists(item : 
           <root/types/azure/azure_workitem>  | 
             item.workItemType='Requirement' and 
             item.priority=1))
->forAll(bug2 : 
           <root/types/azure/azure_workitem>  | 
            bug2.state='Resolved' 
     or  
     bug2.affectsItems
  ->select(item2 | 
                item2.workItemType='Requirement' 
                and 
                item2.priority=1)
  ->forAll(req : 
           <root/types/azure/azure_workitem>  | 
              req.successorItems
             ->exists(item3 | item3.workItemType = 
                                        'Issue' and item3.state='Active' 
               and item3.parentItems                       
               ->intersection(self.in_CRs).size() > 0
      )
  )
)
qaConstraints.description: Ensure that either all Bugs for priority 1 Requirements are 'Resolved' or the Requirement is traced from one of the Change Request's 'active' child Issues.
